# Visual Studio temporary files
.vs/
*.user
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Build results
bin/
obj/
Debug/
Release/

# Test results
TestResults/
*.trx

# NuGet packages
*.nupkg
packages/
*.snupkg

# Rider IDE files
.idea/

# Logs
*.log

# OS generated files
Thumbs.db
.DS_Store
Desktop.ini

# Node/NPM (if using any JS scripts)
node_modules/

# Environment files
.env
